content:
Person 1: Hey, what are you up to today?

Person 2: Not much, just hanging out at home. What about you?

Person 1: I need to run some errands. I have to drop off some packages at the post office and pick up groceries.

Person 2: Do you want some company? I can tag along.

Person 1: Sure, that would be great. Let me finish up what I'm doing and then we can head out.

Person 2: No problem. Just give me a call when you're ready to set off.

Person 1: Will do. I should be done in about 10 minutes. See you then.

Person 2: Okay, sounds good. I'll be ready and waiting.
